required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Role of Propofol Postconditioning on Oxidative Stress and Cognitive Function
clinical_study.official_title: Role of Propofol Postconditioning on Oxidative Stress and Cognitive Function in Patients Undergoing Intracranial Aneurysm Surgery.

lead_sponsor.agency: The Third Central Clinical College of Tianjin Medical University

clinical_study.source: The Third Central Clinical College of Tianjin Medical University

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study was to evaluate differences between propofol postconditioning and sevoflurane anesthesia in the intracranial aneurysm surgery about antioxidant effect.

detailed_description.textblock:
intracranial aneurysm surgery may lead to regional ischemic reperfusion injury. Propofol, as an antioxidative phenol, has been demonstrated that mitigate the brain I/R in rats.
As for sevoflurane, some investigation indicated that sevoflurane is able to reduce oxidative stress in cell(except neuronal cell lines ) and rodent models, but the antioxidant effect did not found in human minor incision surgeries, furthermore, oxidative stress was raised in the major surgeries including orthopedic surgeries, hysterectomy, cholecystectomy, and thoracotomy

primary_outcome.measure: Evidences of Clinically Definite Oxidative Stress Confirmed by ELISA Kit
primary_outcome.time_frame: before induction,after clamping removal ,operation ending ,1,3,7days post surgery
primary_outcome.description: Evidences of clinically definite oxidative stress :Superoxide dismutase activity, Hydroxyl radical

primary_outcome.measure: Evidences of Clinically Definite Oxidative Stress Confirmed by ELISA
primary_outcome.time_frame: before induction, after clamping removal,operation ending,1,3,7days post surgery
primary_outcome.description: Evidences of clinically definite oxidative stress:8-isoprostane,as a reliable biomarkers of lipid peroxidation

primary_outcome.measure: Evidences of Clinically Definite Oxidative Stress:Micronuclei
primary_outcome.time_frame: before induction,clamping removal ,operation ending,1,3,7days post surgery
primary_outcome.description: Evidences of clinically definite oxidative stress:micronuclei confirmed by Cytokinesis-block Micronucleus Test

primary_outcome.measure: Evidences of Clinically Definite Oxidative Stress Confirmed by High Performance Liquid Chromatography
primary_outcome.time_frame: before induction,after clamping removal ,operation ending ,1,3,7days post surgery
primary_outcome.description: Evidences of clinically definite oxidative stress :α- tocopherol,γ- tocopherol which was used to assess the antioxidant defense.

primary_outcome.measure: Evidences of Clinically Definite Oxidative Stress: Nuclear Buds
primary_outcome.time_frame: before induction,clamping removal ,operation ending,1,3,7days post surgery
primary_outcome.description: Evidences of clinically definite oxidative stress:nuclear buds Confirmed by Cytokinesis-block Micronucleus Test

primary_outcome.measure: Evidences of Clinically Definite Oxidative Stress: Nucleoplasmic Bridges
primary_outcome.time_frame: before induction,clamping removal ,operation ending,1,3,7days post surgery
primary_outcome.description: Evidences of clinically definite oxidative stress: nucleoplasmic bridges confirmed by Cytokinesis-block Micronucleus Test

secondary_outcome.description: A questionnaires is used to assess the cognitive function of patients in clinical,the total range was 0-30,and 27-30 were considered as normal value,<27 were considered as recognitive dysfunction.
A questionnaires is used to assess the cognitive function of patients in clinical,the total range was 0-30,and 27-30 were considered as normal value,<27 were considered as recognitive dysfunction.

intervention.description: administrated Target Controlled Infusion(TCI) of propofol (Cp 1.2ug/ml) and decreased sevoflurane with a Bispectral index (BIS) value of 40-60 to maintain anesthesia after clamp removal

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Clinical diagnosis intracranial aneurysm surgery ,
- American Society of Anesthesiologists (ASA)Ⅰ-Ⅱ.
Exclusion Criteria:
- severe hepatic and renal dysfunction
- coagulation disorder
- taking antioxidant perioperative period

overall_official.affiliation: The Third Central Clinical College of Tianjin Medical University

participant_flow.recruitment_details: From July 2014 to January 2016, patients who were undergoing intracranial aneurysm surgery at hospital and consistent with the criterion of American Society of Anesthesiologists (ASA)Ⅰ-Ⅱ,but without severe hepatic and renal dysfunction, coagulation disorder were recruited.

group.title: Propofol Postconditioning
group.description: Group propofol postconditioning was administrated TCI of propofol (Cp 1.2ug/ml) and decreased sevoflurane concentration with a BIS value of 40-60 to maintain anesthesia after clamp removal immediately.

group.title: Propofol Postconditioning
group.description: 1.2ug/ml propofol Group propofol postconditioning was administrated TCI of propofol (Cp 1.2ug/ml) and decreased sevoflurane concentration with a BIS value of 40-60 to maintain anesthesia after clamp removal immediately.

outcome.title: Mini Mental State Examination (MMSE)
outcome.description: A questionnaires is used to assess the cognitive function of patients in clinical,the total range was 0-30,and 27-30 were considered as normal value,<27 were considered as recognitive dysfunction.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: There is NOT an agreement between Principal Investigators and the Sponsor (or its agents) that restricts the PI's rights to discuss or publish trial results after the trial is completed.
